author: tiago
msg: DERBY-4746 (Server) Implement UTF8 support on DRDA
Changes the way the lengths are obtained for Strings in the DRDA protocol.
Also changes the way the server encodes the RDBNAM parameter when being sent back to the client.

author: veithen
msg: Applied a proper fix for AXIS2-4648: instead of doing some fancy guessing, always use the TransportOutDescription passed to the init method of CommonsHTTPTransportSender. Also removed an unnecessary null check.

author: mgentry
msg: Updated the H2 Adapter to support auto-generating primary keys through H2's AUTO_INCREMENT option.

author: rbowen
msg: nitpick: Remove mention of obsolete directive.

author: struberg
msg: OWB-459 upgrade lib and plugin dependencies + fix project names.
The <name> changes in our poms are for making our generated site
